Posts.Content: Thank you so much for getting back to me kate, I will do,I have a date for the nipple reconstruction on the 10th so hopefully can ask the surgeon what will happen if i need the implant changed would it effect the new nipple!!!Like you I struggled with femara and am now trying arimidex thanks again penny
Posts.Title: problems with funding

Posts.Content: hi has anyone had trouble with funding? I have been told that i will have to apply to the primary care trust for special funding as i have already had an implant exchange after mastectomy but due to the radiotherapy the skin wasn't stretched enough.They say they will do the nipple reconstruction though but I feel guilty for not feeling happy with the way things are.
